text: Aur baaz ehal-e-dehaat mein aisay bhi hain jo Allah Taalaa per aur qayamat kay din per eman rakhtay hain aur jo kuch kharach kertay hain inn ko indallah qurb hasil honey ka zariya aur rasool ki dua ka zariya banatay hain yaad rakho kay inn kay yeh kharach kerna be-shak inn kay liye mojib-e-qurbat hai inn ko Allah Taalaa zaroor apni remat mein dakhil keray ga Allah Taalaa bari maghfirat wala bari rehmat wala hai
